Reviews.Title: This phone is perfect if you want something simple and easy
Reviews.Author: Seth Koeut
Reviews.Content: I wanted a phone that would work everywhere and not be overly complicated.  Also it serves the purpose of allowing me to pop a SIM card from any country and use the phone all over the world.

Reviews.Title: Great travel phone
Reviews.Author: Linda Friedman
Reviews.Content: This is a basic easy to use phone, user manual limited but easy enough to figure out. It met my needs for travel in Costa Rica with an inexpensive Sim card purchased right at the airport.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive and good battery.
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: simple features, simple phone, 2 SIM slots and good battery, great for a throw away phone when traveling abroad when you don't want to risk your nicer phone.

Reviews.Title: Good Backup Phone
Reviews.Author: Rajasekhar S. Gavini
Reviews.Content: It is good for the money you pay. I recommend buying if you are not into hi-tech stuff. Simple to use and setup. Dual SIM works. But I was not able to set up voice mail with this phone.

Reviews.Title: small, handy, reliable
Reviews.Author: mp
Reviews.Content: Much, much better than expected, it is a perfect backup phone for a low price and with all the essential features I need.

Reviews.Title: there is no 3.5mm audio jack
Reviews.Author: Markus
Reviews.Content: The technical specs state it has a 3.5mm audio jack.It does not.The device comes with USB audio out.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Unlocked Dual SIM Cell Phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Dual SIM Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 mHz frequencies for both SIM Slots.
Dual Sim Card Slot; Stereo FM radio; MP3 player; Flashlight and MicroSD slot upgradeable up to 8GB.
1.8" LCD Display; Predictive text input and MP3 Ringtones.
Talk time up to 3 to 4 hrs - Stand-by up to 160-200 hrs.
ProductInfo.Name: BLU T130 Deejay Lite - Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - Black
